columns.text:
This property came into the possession of the owners (a married couple of two local people) .
They were two “hyposkafa” , these unique cave-like buildings with high ceilings as a legacy from their grandparents to make their dream come true. They own veterinary clinic so that they can offer their best to the animals of Santorini.

 

Proceeding from the construction of the clinic they discovered the existence of two old caves carved into the volcanic soil that ensured refreshing coolness. They used them as ‘canavas’, as the locals call the wine cellars, where they used to make wine by squeezing the grapes by foot and storing them in wooden barrels. These buildings were abandoned around the 1950s. And so they decided to restore them, keeping their unique architecture to create two beautiful houses that can accommodate anyone who chose to come to this unique island.

items.title: Athiri Cave & Vinsanto Cave
items.description: The houses are covering an area of 75m2 (Athiri Cave) and 90m2 (Vinsanto Cave).
items.excerpt: The houses are covering an area of 75m2 (Athiri Cave) and 90m2 (Vinsanto Cave).
items.amenities:
• Max capacity: 5

items.title: Above Blue Suites
items.description: Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.Suites are different in size and formation while an endless palette of coloring combinations offers to each one a unique personality and a singular style.Each suite offers stunning views to the Caldera, Thirassia, the volcano and the village of Oia. Hospitality reaches new heights at Santorini’s latest landmark; a top-notch cluster of uber elegant suites scattered on a steep rocky slope of the island’s famous Caldera, subtly linked with luring steps to form a delightful hamlet. The ten individually designed colour-coded suites, complemented by a secluded exclusive villa, are housed in some of the island’s immaculately restored signature caves and exude a feeling of intimacy, exclusive luxury and local allure, while ideally bridging the awe-inspiring sleeping volcano with romantic sunsets.
items.excerpt: Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano, sunset and village of Oia
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival
Champagne glasses on the first sunsets

items.title: Aplai Dome Santorini
items.description: Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style. In absolute harmony with island’s architecture Aplai Dome is built in Oia’ s area. It is only 170 meters far from Oia’s centre where you can admire the unique and worldwide known Caldera of Santorini and at the same time to visit high aesthetic shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. In very close distance and only 2 kilometers from Aplai Dome is the exotic and known for its volcanic rocks Kouloymbos beach, the organized beach Baxe and for the more adventurous of you one kilometer far from Aplai Dome is the Ammodi, the old port of Santorini, with a lot of traditional fish taverns and the Sant Nikolas island which challenge you to dive in the blue Aegean sea. In the center of the Aplai Dome complex dominates a minimalist design swimming pool with hydromassage, while its rooms have a private veranda with stunning views of the sunset of Oia and the endless blue of the Aegean Sea. Aplai Dome is 10 km from Fira Town, 12 km from the port and 11 km from the airport. It has luxurious facilities like spa, gym, air conditioning, wi-fi, TV, fridge, sink, electric hotplate, safe box, hairdryer. The wonderful pool area is ideal for relaxing moments and for enjoying your breakfast with coffee, snacks, drinks, sunbathing all day long or reading under the umbrellas until the evening, when the sun falls into the blue of the Aegean Sea.
items.excerpt: Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style.
